metadata.title: Men 's Casual Fleece Pants Solid Heavyweight Sweatpants Jogging Cargo Pocket Fashion Jogger SportsElastic Trousers
features: Material. Made of 60% cotton & 40% polyester, skin-friendly and breathable, thick fabric, oversized, soft and comfortable, breathable and wearable.

Design: Drawstring closure design, men's sweatpants with pockets, solid color elastic waist casual pants, exquisite workmanship, elastic leg opening design, Multi-pocket :Tactical Side Cargo Pockets,Two side pockets. Stay cool! These pants are very simple and stylish, fashionable and unique.
Sizes: Men's elastic waist sweatpants available in M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL,5XL. Please refer to the size chart on the left before ordering.

Occasions: Men's Pure Goods sweatpants are perfect for most occasions in life, jogging, running, climbing, sleeping, relaxing, daily wear, yoga, work, holidays, photography, school wear, whether you wear or send friends and family are a good choice.
Important: This is Asian Size, May Runs Small than US Size, Please Refer to Our size Chart in The Product Description Below ,We Suggest Choosing 2-3 up than Usual!
description: Hello! Welcome to our store! Quality is the first with best service. customers all are our friends.   Main Color: As The Picture Show New in Fashion Material:60% Cotton, 40% Polyester Size: M-XXXL Color: Red, White, Black, Light Grey, Dark Grey  Please Note: There is 2-3% difference according to manual measurement. please check the measurement chart carefully before you buy the item. Please note that slight color difference should be acceptable due to the light and screen.  Package included: 1x Men's Pants
